page.title: 05 THE NUTFIELD ROAD RACE
page.content: The{Nutfield Road Race}started in{1976 when{Mr.Wilderspin}saw a picture of the race in{1904}and thought it would be a good idea to start it again. The first year{13}people ran,the second{10}people,and the year{7 } people.Nowadays there are about{50 } people who run.{Mr.Sheppard}hopes there will be a very large number running next year the race's{tenth } {aniversary}.There is a{Road Race } {committee}consisting of a{Road Safty man, a man who{advertises}the race, a {treasurer, a secretary,}and {timekeepers. } The children's race is{3\}miles long and the{fastest}time recorded over this course is{23mins 12 secs.The senior course is{5 miles}and the record time recorded on this course is{27mins 17secs.}Entrants for the race must be residents of{Nutfield.}
